---
title: Submit a Signed Withdrawal Transaction for Broadcast
slug: /staking/near/undelegate/submit-signed-withdraw-transaction
pagination_next: null
---

After signing the transaction, send a `PUT` request to `/api/v1/flows/[:flow_id]/next`.
The Staking API will broadcast the transaction to the NEAR network.

### Parameters

- `name` &mdash; `string` Name of the action to execute (required).
- `inputs` &mdash; `object`
  - `transaction_payload` &mdash; `string` Signed transaction payload from the previous step's response (required).

#### Sample cURL Request

```bash {5-8}
curl -X PUT 'https://near-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/4f866b7f-2e79-4c61-9bb4-398777c12a0b/next' \
-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
-H 'Authorization: <api_key>' \
-d '{
  "name": "sign_withdraw_tx",
   "inputs": {
    "transaction_payload": ""
  }
}'
```

### Response

With the signed transaction provided, Staking API will broadcast it to the network. As the transaction progresses towards confirmation, the returned state will be either:

- `withdraw_tx_broadcasting` &mdash; Transaction has been broadcast and is waiting for confirmation.
- `withdrawn` &mdash; Transaction has been confirmed and the withdrawal is complete.

#### Sample Response

```json {4,8,30-41}
{
  "id": "4f866b7f-2e79-4c61-9bb4-398777c12a0b",
  "operation": "unstaking",
  "state": "withdraw_tx_broadcasting",
  "actions": [
    {
      "name": "wait",
      "estimated_state_change_at": "2023-03-01T18:23:50.088Z",
      "inputs": []
    }
  ],
  "data": {
    "delegator_address": "0b81cc09294fc074814ad0de50f31644e5669f856105399b.testnet",
    "delegator_pubkey": "ed25519:NUbTcj78nHFFm1J8a1GFjenAnCKV32ZdBeeqem8oyLV",
    "validator_address": "legends.pool.f863973.m0",
    "max_gas": null,
    "undelegate_amount": "5.0",
    "undelegate_maximum": null,
    "undelegate_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "ab06236a0916604347fbbfc0c803d374fd28e6eb69f2edce3c2e6ac23e1f0452",
      "signed": " ",
      "hash": "CWc9R6SdHVwVHj1rhYiwBgK2sqkVdbBj1wG4QniUXwqT",
      "status": "confirmed",
      "error": null,
      "signatures": [],
      "block_time": null
    },
    "estimated_inactive_at": "2023-03-01T18:29:48.741Z",
    "withdraw_amount": "5.0",
    "withdraw_maximum": null,
    "withdraw_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "3d86e4c351bc002fd7fbdb0686cc872393c87ffe3a4470cb010857bc739d6784",
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "59BAsPfQtJEzaNJghq6HYDhTBupTUvm63FRNdXG447vb",
      "status": null,
      "error": null,
      "signatures": [],
      "block_time": null
    }
  },
  "network_code": "near",
  "chain_code": "testnet",
  "created_at": "2023-02-27T17:51:08.550Z",
  "updated_at": "2023-03-01T18:22:49.608Z"
}
```
